languages.text: "Должен признать — лейтенант далеко не худший материал для офицера, далеко не худший", {n}— ворчливо добавляет Абеляр.{/n} "Но, во имя Терры, девочка — одного возраста с моей старшей правнучкой! И учит меня, как управляться с нижними палубами и ловить культистов. Пройдет еще лет двадцать, прежде чем ей можно будет доверить самостоятельные действия".

"I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."
languages.original_text: "Должен признать — лейтенант далеко не худший материал для офицера, далеко не худший", {n}— ворчливо добавляет Абеляр.{/n} "Но, во имя Терры, девочка — одного возраста с моей старшей правнучкой! И учит меня, как управляться с нижними палубами и ловить культистов. Пройдет еще лет двадцать, прежде чем ей можно будет доверить самостоятельные действия".

traits.locale_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer, by no means," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down pirates. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer, by no means," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! traits.locale_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “实话实说，那位中尉算不上是最糟糕的军官。”{n}阿贝拉德暴躁地补充道。{/n}“不过，以泰拉的名义，那个姑娘仅仅和我年龄最大的曾孙女一样大！她居然敢告诉我该如何管理底层甲板，如何追捕异端分子。我认为至少要再过上二十年，她才可以在没有监督的情况下独自行事。”
languages.original_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."

traits.locale_text: “实话实说，那位中尉并不算是最糟糕的军官，并非如此。”{n}阿贝拉德暴躁地补充道。{/n}“不过，以泰拉的名义，那个姑娘仅仅和我年龄最大的曾孙女一样大！她居然敢告诉我该如何管理底层甲板，如何追捕海盗。我认为至少要再过上二十年，她才可以在没有监督的情况下独自行事。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Admito que la teniente no es ni mucho menos la peor oficial que he visto». {n}Abelard añade, irritado.{/n} «Pero ¡por el amor de Terra, tiene la misma edad que la mayor de mis bisnietas! Y todavía se atreve a decirme cómo gestionar las cubiertas inferiores y dar caza a cultistas. Le faltan veinte años para poder dejarle actuar sin supervisión».
languages.original_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."

traits.locale_text: «Admito que la teniente no es no mucho menos la peor oficial que he visto, no». {n}Abelard añade, irritado.{/n} «Pero ¡por el amor de Terra, tiene la misma edad que la mayor de mis bisnietas! Y todavía se atreve a decirme cómo gestionar las cubiertas inferiores y dar caza a piratas. Le faltan veinte años para poder dejarle actuar sin supervisión».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「副官が士官として最悪の人材であることは認めざるを得ません」{n}アベラルドは不機嫌に付け加える。{/n}「しかし、あの娘は我が長女のひ孫と同い年です。下層デッキの管理や教団退治を我に指図するとは。彼女が監督なしに行動できるようになるまでには、少なくともあと20年はかかるでしょうに」
languages.original_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."

traits.locale_text: 「副官が士官として最悪の人材であることは認めざるを得ません」{n}アベラルドは不機嫌に付け加える。{/n}「しかし、あの娘は我が長女のひ孫と同い年です。下層デッキの管理や教団退治を我に指図するとは。彼女が監督なしに行動できるようになるまでには、少なくともあと20年はかかるでしょうに」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss zugeben, der Lieutenant ist bei weitem nicht das schlimmste Offiziersmaterial"{n}, fügt Abelard mürrisch hinzu.{/n} "Aber bei Terras Namen, das Mädchen ist so alt wie meine älteste Urgroßtochter! Und sie besitzt die Dreistigkeit, mir zu sagen, wie ich die unteren Decks leiten und wie ich Kultisten jagen soll. Es wird noch mindestens zwanzig Jahre dauern, ehe man sie allein und ohne Aufsicht agieren lassen kann."
languages.original_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss zugeben, der Lieutenant ist bei weitem nicht das schlimmste Offiziersmaterial"{n}, fügt Abelard mürrisch hinzu.{/n} "Aber bei Terras Namen, das Mädchen ist so alt wie meine älteste Urgroßtochter! Und sie besitzt die Dreistigkeit, mir zu sagen, wie ich die unteren Decks leiten und wie ich Piraten jagen soll. Es wird noch mindestens zwanzig Jahre dauern, ehe man sie allein und ohne Aufsicht agieren lassen kann."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je reconnais qu'elle a l'étoffe d'un bon officier, {n}ajoute Abélard d'un air irrité.{/n} Mais, au nom de Terra, cette gamine a le même âge que mon arrière-petite-fille, et elle a l'audace de me dire comment administrer les ponts inférieurs et débusquer les cultistes ! Il lui faudra encore une bonne vingtaine d'années pour apprendre les ficelles du métier. »
languages.original_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."

traits.locale_text: « Je reconnais qu'elle a l'étoffe d'un bon officier, {n}ajoute Abélard d'un air irrité.{/n} Mais, au nom de Terra, cette gamine a le même âge que mon arrière-petite-fille, et elle a l'audace de me dire comment administrer les ponts inférieurs et débusquer les pirates ! Il lui faudra encore une bonne vingtaine d'années pour apprendre les ficelles du métier. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kabul etmeli ki Teğmen, bir subay için hiç fena sayılmaz." {n}Abelard, huysuzca ekliyor.{/n} "Lakin Terra şahidim kızcağız, torunumun torunu yaşında! Gelmiş, alt güverteyi nasıl yöneteceğimi ve tarikatçıları nasıl avlayacağımı öğretmeye kalkıyor. Bu işi gözetimsiz yapması için daha yirmi senesi var."
languages.original_text: "I must admit that the lieutenant is by no means the worst material for an officer," {n}Abelard adds peevishly.{/n} "But, in the name of Terra, the girl is the same age as my eldest great-granddaughter! And she has the gall to tell me how to manage the lower decks and hunt down cultists. It will be another twenty years at least before she can be trusted to act without oversight."

traits.locale_text: "Kabul etmeli ki teğmen, bir subay için hiç fena sayılmaz." {n}Diye huysuzca ekliyor Abelard.{/n} "Lakin Terra şahidim ki kadın, ninemin ninesi olacak yaşta! Üstüne üstlük alt güverteyi nasıl yöneteceğimi ve tarikatçıları nasıl avlayacağımı öğretmeye kalkıyor. Gözetim olmadan iş yapabilmesi için yirmi yıl geçmesi lazım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
